detail_desc: T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved, straight-cut shirt in an organic cotton weave with two chest pockets, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a small stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Zipped sleeve pocket, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in softly draping viscose jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a wrapover skirt.
Trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button and front and back pockets. Slim fit with narrow hems.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in airy linen jersey. Deep V-neck at the back with a knot detail.
Wide, twill trousers in a wool blend with a high waist, pleats at the top and wide, gently tapered legs. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Sturdy hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim 7 cm.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a viscose blend with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases and easy-access flap pockets. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Mini plastic hair claws.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a soft shaft and zip at the back. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heels 8 cm.

Lightweight shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with internal elastication and a drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and rounded hems with wrapover sides. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave containing some wool with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly with a button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette. For the matching jacket, search on 0451290.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Jeggings in soft, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and back pockets. Adjustable, elasticated waist in sizes 8-12Y.

V-neck playsuit in a viscose weave with lace details, a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the neckline and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with wrapover sides. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in satin. V-neck with a tie, decorative pleated details at the shoulders and a seam at the waist with an elasticated section at the back. Lined.
Satin nightshirt with print stripes, notch lapels, buttons down the front and long, cuffed sleeves. Chest pocket and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Patterned tights with extra space for a growing tummy.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and a fabric appliqué on one sleeve. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining. Polyester filling.

Shirt in a cotton twill weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Short, straight-cut dress in jersey with faceted sparkly stones at the top and a round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Short butterfly sleeves that are slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Coat in soft bouclé made from a wool blend with raw edges and buttons down the front. Flap front pockets, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Mules with scallop-edged straps. Leather linings and insoles and smooth ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in a patterned linen and cotton weave with elastication at the top and 3/4-length, elasticated puff sleeves with decorative ties and a flounce. Elasticated seam at the waist, pockets in the sides and tapered legs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Round-necked pointelle top in a soft viscose blend with short sleeves.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.

Sleeveless blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Flounces down the front that continue back over the shoulders and a gathered seam with a scalloped flounce at the hem.
Long metal earrings decorated with sparkly stones. Length 8.5 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small collar, V-neck and gathered yoke at the back. Gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Hooded jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Glittery ballet pumps with a braided imitation suede trim at the top and loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Tube top in smocked cotton jersey with a frill trim top and bottom.
Cardigan knitted in soft, garter-stitched cotton with buttons down the front and long sleeves.

Studio Collection. Briefs in patterned mesh with neat lace trims. Low waist, a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Metal watch with an adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3 cm, width of links 1.5 cm, length of bracelet 23 cm.

Puffer jacket in imitation patent leather with a hood, high collar and zip down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, welt front pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.
Small shoulder bag in imitation suede with a quilted front, zip at the top and narrow shoulder strap. Lined. Size 16x23.5 cm.
Short, one-shoulder dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and a narrow, double shoulder strap. A-line with a flounce at the hem. Lined.

Short dress woven in a viscose and linen blend with a collar, deep V-neck and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist with a knot detail and gently draping skirt with a sewn-in wrapover. Unlined.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey. Long sleeved top with a print motif and appliqués in the shape of cat ears on the front. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder and mesh bat wings with a glittery print under the arms. Skinny-fit, glittery leggings with easy pull-on, soft, covered elastication at the waist.
T-shirt in patterned jersey.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
V-neck top in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Lace-covered trim at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and covered buttons at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave and pair of leggings in jersey. Blouse with a frill-trimmed yoke, button placket and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Ankle-length jumpsuit woven in a modal blend with notch lapels, a yoke and a concealed zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, side pockets and flap chest pockets with a tab and D-rings. Elasticated seam at the waist, a detachable tie belt and straight legs that taper to the hem. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in mesh and chiffon with a bead-embroidered bodice in a narrow cut at the top. Adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back, a concealed zip in one side and an open back. Seam at the waist and a softly draping, flared skirt. Lined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Short dress in an airy, textured weave with a wrapover top and an open back with wide ties at the back of the neck. Short, voluminous puff sleeves with covered elastication at the hems, and a gathered seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back. Lined.
Shorts in stretch, printed denim with covered elastication at the waist, fake front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
Pyjama shorts in satin with a slight sheen. Elasticated waist and flounce at the hems.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in softly draping silk with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless, round-necked top in a softly draping silk blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and a rounded hem.
Bandeau bras in lace with lined, padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and a concealed silicone trim at the top.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Top in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a smocked bodice and frill-trimmed square neckline. Short, wide sleeves with wide elastication at the top. Gently flared peplum at the hem.
Sleeveless dress in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck and rounded hem. Unlined.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fitted, calf-length dress in stretch jersey with zigzag seams around the neckline and armholes. Narrow cut at the top, a racer back and a slit in one side.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
V-neck jumpsuit in soft, gently draping silk with narrow shoulder straps, a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, straight legs.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-style jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with a small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Short shorts in stretch twill with a regular waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in airy linen jersey.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a high waist and raw-edge hems.
